devBlogEntries.title: First Blog Ever
devBlogEntries.author: Graysen
devBlogEntries.text: Hi all! This is my first blog post! I'm planning to document my web development journey. Super excited to share this adventure with ya'll! As I progress, feel free to give me tips and tricks. :)

devBlogEntries.title: Learning JavaScript Basics
devBlogEntries.author: Graysen
devBlogEntries.text: Just finished my first JavaScript tutorial! Variables, functions, and loops are starting to make sense. Still struggling with scope but getting there. Can't wait to build my first interactive webpage!

devBlogEntries.title: Attempting GitHub
devBlogEntries.author: Graysen
tags.text: Hey all! I've been getting more involved with GitHub. I haven't used it much, so this has been a great opportunity to learn about it! Let me know if you have any tips.
